name: First Day (itch) (ScottLeatherbarrow, JustinLeatherbarrow, billbooth, TDinham)
description:
First Day is a fast paced arcade game in which the players goal is to make as many friends as they possibly can. It was developed for Anglia Ruskin University's, Brains Eden 2019 Game Jam. The theme for this jam was 'Chain Reaction'. 

This project was developed from scratch between 4 graduate programmers within the jams 48 hour timeframe.

How To Play:

Its your first day at a new school, being the new kid around you'll need to make some friends, enter a playground and give the other kids the toys they want and im sure you will be friends for life!

Kids can be upset easily, give them the wrong item and they will burst into tears, other kids will begin to cry like its a disease so be sure to not leave them upset for too long, i hear sweets quickly end their crying.

Have fun in the playground kiddo, good luck!
